MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G43 and G44 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.09pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:16pm on Tuesday, 02 March 2021
